card.name: Golgari Guildmage
Ribbons of Night
card.property: Ribbons of Night deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain 4 life. If {U} was spent to cast Ribbons of Night, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My favorite meal is angel's flesh, slain in agony and iced with black vinegar."—Aszala of House Dimir

card.name: Blazing Archon
card.property: Flying Creatures can't attack you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war."—Dravin, Gruul deserter

card.name: Empty the Catacombs
card.property: Each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the dead are laid to rest in Ravnica, it's usually just a nap.

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Goblin Fire Fiend
card.property: Haste Goblin Fire Fiend must be blocked if able. {R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Hunted Lammasu
card.property: Flying When Hunted Lammasu enters the battlefield, target opponent creates a 4/4 black Horror creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lammasu ruled the velds before the city grew. Now they roam Ravnica's skies, but their ancient enemies have not forgotten them.

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Dream Leash
card.property: Enchant permanent You can't choose an untapped permanent as Dream Leash's target as you cast Dream Leash. You control enchanted permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tendrils of sorcery find easy purchase on the soft underbelly of dreams.

card.name: Char
card.property: Char deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

card.name: Remand
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive."

card.name: Drift of Phantasms
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Keening Banshee
card.property: Flying When Keening Banshee enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.

card.name: Sisters of Stone Death
card.property: {G}: Target creature blocks Sisters of Stone Death this turn if able. {B}{G}: Exile target creature blocking or blocked by Sisters of Stone Death. {2}{B}: Put a creature card exiled with Sisters of Stone Death onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Excruciator
card.property: Damage that would be dealt by Excruciator can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though used as a piercing weapon, the tusk is more akin to a stinger, spreading pain instantly throughout the body of its victim. This specimen deserves further study."—Simic research notes

card.name: Seismic Spike
card.property: Destroy target land. Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Natural disasters in Ravnica are largely nullified by the Izzet. Unnatural disasters, on the other hand, happen all of the time.

card.name: Boros Recruit
card.property: ({R/W} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.) First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at this goblin, once wild, untamed, and full of idiocy. The Boros have given him the skill of a soldier and focused his heart with a single cause."—Razia

card.name: Bramble Elemental
card.property: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica is a seamless urban tapestry, each city bleeding into the next. In abandoned corners, however, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.

card.name: Dark Confidant
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Bloodletter Quill
card.property: {2}, {T}, Put a blood counter on Bloodletter Quill: Draw a card, then you lose 1 life for each blood counter on Bloodletter Quill. {U}{B}: Remove a blood counter from Bloodletter Quill.

card.name: Sundering Vitae
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries of wind, rain, and roots compressed into an instant of destruction: such is the power of Selesnya.

card.name: Sewerdreg
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Sacrifice Sewerdreg: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They hardly have form, dripping through pipe and grate with the slip and stench of flowing sewage.

card.name: Nullmage Shepherd
card.property: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shepherds work in secret, seeking out abominations against nature and returning them to earth and dust.

card.name: Three Dreams
card.property: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Choose one to heal, one to harm, and one to grant you the prudence to use them."—Miotri, auratouched mage

card.name: Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sunhome—the stalwart shield, the towering sentinel, the seat of justice.

card.name: Copy Enchantment
card.property: You may have Copy Enchantment enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic mages create redundant backups of their experiments to reduce the consequences of catastrophe.

card.name: Peel from Reality
card.property: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When House Dimir's secrets are in danger of exposure, the guild takes drastic measures to cover its tracks.

card.name: Selesnya Evangel
card.property: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The clamor of the city drowns all voices. But together we can sing a harmony that will resonate from Ravnica's tallest spires to her deepest wells."

card.name: Drooling Groodion

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Golgari expand, yes, but I refuse to call their tainted creations 'growth.'"—Veszka, Selesnya evangel

card.name: Boros Guildmage
Followed Footsteps
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aether can turn a footprint into a blueprint.

card.name: Glare of Subdual
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact or creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.

card.name: Watery Grave
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Bloodbond March
card.property: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, each player returns all cards with the same name as that spell from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari support a vast army because death never ends its soldiers' service.

card.name: Auratouched Mage
card.property: When Auratouched Mage enters the battlefield, search your library for an Aura card that could enchant it. If Auratouched Mage is still on the battlefield, put that Aura card onto the battlefield attached to it. Otherwise, reveal the Aura card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Tidewater Minion
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {4}: Tidewater Minion loses defender until end of turn. {T}: Untap target permanent.

card.name: Goblin Spelunkers
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chimney sweeps, explorers of abandoned buildings, spire climbers . . . goblin spelunkers have found countless niches within Ravnica's metropolis.

card.name: Scatter the Seeds
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

card.name: Zephyr Spirit
card.property: When Zephyr Spirit blocks, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spiteful force exists on Ravnica that binds these ghosts to the land of the living but forbids them to touch it.

card.name: Nullstone Gargoyle
card.property: Flying Whenever the first noncreature spell of a turn is cast, counter that spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nullstone absorbs and dampens most forms of magical energy, as well as light, sound, and heat.

card.name: Disembowel
card.property: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thought we found the victim's clothes lumped in the street. As it turned out, it was the victim, insides sucked out—just a sack of skin and robes."—Agrus Kos

card.name: Golgari Brownscale
card.property: When Golgari Brownscale is put into your hand from your graveyard, you gain 2 life. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Woodwraith Corrupter

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its darkened sap penetrates natural fibers and spreads its own genes. Emulation experiments are underway."—Simic research notes

card.name: Twisted Justice
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Otiev's mind, he ruled in favor of the accused. But in his courtroom he was only a spectator, watching his hand deliver the sign of death.

card.name: Chorus of the Conclave
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) As an additional cost to cast creature spells, you may pay any amount of mana. If you do, that creature enters the battlefield with that many additional +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are many, yet one. We are separate in body, yet speak with a single voice. Join us in our chorus."

card.name: Golgari Germination
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

card.name: Vindictive Mob
card.property: When Vindictive Mob enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. Vindictive Mob can't be blocked by Saprolings.

card.name: Induce Paranoia
card.property: Counter target spell. If {B} was spent to cast Induce Paranoia, that spell's controller puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Dimir Aqueduct
card.property: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Drake Familiar
card.property: Flying When Drake Familiar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an enchantment to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Falconry? A fine sport I suppose, if you're attracted to the frailty of birds."—Trivaz, Izzet mage

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Eye of the Storm
card.property: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery card, exile it. Then that player copies each instant or sorcery card exiled with Eye of the Storm. For each copy, the player may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Cyclopean Snare
card.property: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature, then return Cyclopean Snare to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spoiled, gluttonous halls of the Orzhov teem with gaudy, needless wealth. Even their security measures are made for beauty first, efficiency second.

card.name: Surveilling Sprite
card.property: Flying When Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

card.name: Goliath Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The glittering strands of its complex web catch everything from a buzzing gnat to a passing bloatdrake.

card.name: Psychic Drain
card.property: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard and you gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gold can be reearned, goods restored. The moroii steal youth, more precious than either, and once gone, it's gone forever."—Berta Suszat, civic healer

card.name: Belltower Sphinx
card.property: Flying Whenever a source deals damage to Belltower Sphinx, that source's controller puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Lurking Informant
card.property: ({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {2}, {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the undercity, forgetfulness is often encouraged at the point of a blade.

card.name: Vedalken Dismisser
card.property: When Vedalken Dismisser enters the battlefield, put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I crept up on him, quiet as a guttermouse. And then suddenly I found myself facedown in a latrine pit behind Tin Street Market."—Sirislav, Dimir spy

card.name: Crown of Convergence
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, creatures you control that share a color with that card get +1/+1. {G}{W}: Put the top card of your library on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Ghosts of the Innocent
card.property: If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals half that damage, rounded down, to that creature or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ma said we should offer up blini-cakes and salt to the good ones, but I get that chill up my spine and just shut the door."—Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

card.name: Civic Wayfinder
card.property: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

card.name: Peregrine Mask
card.property: Equipped creature has defender, flying, and first strike. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mask confers both the prowess of a falcon and its loyalty.

card.name: Leashling
card.property: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: Return Leashling to its owner's hand.

card.name: Conclave's Blessing
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 for each other creature you control.

card.name: Quickchange
card.property: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most Ravnicans lead lives of desperate survival. Those who thrive are malleable enough to change with the ever-shifting politics of the guilds.

card.name: Hunted Phantasm
card.property: Hunted Phantasm can't be blocked. When Hunted Phantasm enters the battlefield, target opponent creates five 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Selesnya Guildmage
Tattered Drake
card.property: Flying {B}: Regenerate Tattered Drake.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drakes embody the worst of Ravnica: great potential, twisted by selfishness and greed."—Razia

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Ethereal Usher
card.property: {U}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Sunhome Enforcer
card.property: Whenever Sunhome Enforcer deals combat damage, you gain that much life. {1}{R}: Sunhome Enforcer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Law soothed his savage heart. Where fury once burned, the enduring flame of order now shines."—Razia

card.name: Strands of Undeath
card.property: Enchant creature When Strands of Undeath enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards. {B}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why limit yourself to mortal law when you can outlive those who enforce it?"—Czaric, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

card.name: Terraformer
card.property: {1}: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This feels a little more like home."

card.name: Dryad's Caress
card.property: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. If {W} was spent to cast Dryad's Caress, untap all creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I awoke to the face of beauty, my body fully healed. In that moment I knew my destiny was the Conclave's to shape."—Rogad, Selesnya initiate

card.name: Light of Sanction
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control by sources you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Legion looks after its own.

card.name: Moroii
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Touched by moroii"—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

card.name: Phytohydra
card.property: If damage would be dealt to Phytohydra, put that many +1/+1 counters on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at this creature, so like the Conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes."—Veszka, Selesnya evangel

card.name: Convolute
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The words came to the sorcerer's lips but refused to budge any further.

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Conclave Equenaut
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Siege Wurm
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rubblefield was once among the wealthiest districts in Ravnica. All it took was a single wurm to reduce it to ruins.

card.name: Tunnel Vision
card.property: Choose a card name. Target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until a card with that name is revealed. If it is, that player puts the rest of the revealed cards into his or her graveyard and puts the card with the chosen name on top of his or her library. Otherwise, the player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Festival of the Guildpact
card.property: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everyone knows that violence at the Festival brings the worst of luck, so for at least one day a year arms are laid down in favor of brimming goblets.

card.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
card.property: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

card.name: Master Warcraft
card.property: Cast Master Warcraft only before attackers are declared. You choose which creatures attack this turn. You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.

card.name: Leave No Trace
card.property: Radiance — Destroy target enchantment and each other enchantment that shares a color with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magic of the Boros patrols the streets even when their soldiers do not.

card.name: Hunted Troll
card.property: When Hunted Troll enters the battlefield, target opponent creates four 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying. {G}: Regenerate Hunted Troll.

card.name: Indentured Oaf
card.property: Prevent all damage that Indentured Oaf would deal to red creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All it knows is the difference between friend and food.

card.name: Brightflame
card.property: Radiance — Brightflame deals X damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the pyres of the unbelievers light our way."—Razia

card.name: Carrion Howler
card.property: Pay 1 life: Carrion Howler gets +2/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They chase tirelessly after the bone-carts that speed along the streets of the Plague Quarter.

card.name: Razia, Boros Archangel
card.property: Flying, vigilance, haste {T}: The next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her sword burns with such brightness that foes avert their eyes and arrows divert their paths.

card.name: Dimir Machinations
card.property: Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Exile any number of those cards, then put the rest back in any order. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Overgrown Tomb
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.) As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Autochthon Wurm
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The trainer awoke to begin the journey from the wurm's tail to its head. The sun was setting when she arrived.

card.name: Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran
card.property: Whenever Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran attacks, attacking red creatures get +2/+0 and attacking white creatures get +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lieutenant Kos has never met a group of recruits he could not inspire or a mob he could not quell.

card.name: Telling Time
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."

card.name: Bottled Cloister
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Bottled Cloister to your hand, then draw a card.

card.name: Stinkweed Imp
card.property: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Devouring Light
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Exile target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Into the light the good are welcomed, and with the light the evil are banished.

card.name: Benevolent Ancestor
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.

card.name: Breath of Fury
card.property: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and attach Breath of Fury to a creature you control. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Concerted Effort
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, landwalk, protection, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Svogthos, the Restless Tomb
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {3}{B}{G}: Until end of turn, Svogthos, the Restless Tomb becomes a black and green Plant Zombie creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." It's still a land.

card.name: Thundersong Trumpeter
card.property: {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hear that? Those notes mean we've arrived at Sunhome! Let our allies' hearts soar and our enemies' hearts shatter at the sound!"—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

card.name: Necromantic Thirst
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Vinelasher Kudzu
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Vinelasher Kudzu.

card.name: Suppression Field
card.property: Activated abilities cost {2} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most feared of Azorius punishments is to be freed—sent back out into the world, stripped of all magical defenses.

card.name: Torpid Moloch
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice three lands: Torpid Moloch loses defender until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Market hucksters sell molochs for use as watchdogs. Of course, that's all molochs do. Sit around . . . and watch.

card.name: Ursapine
card.property: {G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A friendly ursapine means a constant supply of sharp spears. An unfriendly one means a constant supply of small holes.

card.name: Dogpile
card.property: Dogpile deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no shelter from this storm, its rain of fists, or the thunderous cackles of bloodlust.

card.name: Sacred Foundry

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soil here is rich with the rotting dead, and the sun's fingers barely penetrate the dark canopy. Plant our brethren here. This shall be our sanctuary."—Savra

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Screeching Griffin

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They were master fishers, but their seas are now the streets and their catch, the goblins that run pell-mell from the screeching in the sky.

card.name: Grayscaled Gharial
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each tooth carries enough bacteria to kill a person in a day or two. But then, gharials do have 138 teeth.

card.name: Sunforger
Infectious Host
card.property: When Infectious Host dies, target player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lost man, dead man, knocking on the door.Cankerman, soreman, knock no more."—Ravnican children's rhyme

card.name: Rain of Embers
card.property: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

card.name: Greater Forgeling
card.property: {1} {R}: Greater Forgeling gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few have seen the inner workings of Ravnica's furnaces, but neighboring districts catch brief glimpses in the horrors that escape the flames.

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

property.name: Flavor

card.name: War-Torch Goblin
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice War-Torch Goblin: War-Torch Goblin deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor

card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.property: {2} {G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.value: He combs the streets looking for the lost light, the discarded enigmas of the city.

card.name: Loxodon Gatekeeper
card.property: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gatekeepers are so fastidious that even the winds must wait to pass.

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Wizened Snitches
card.property: Flying Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful what information you ask them to find, for it will likely be the subject of tale time at the alehouse."—Sirislav, Dimir spy

card.name: Golgari Thug
card.property: When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly four cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Temple Garden
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.) As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Temple Garden enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Firemane Angel
card.property: Flying, first strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life. {6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Sins of the Past
card.property: Until end of turn, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. Exile Sins of the Past.

card.name: Stasis Cell
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.

card.name: Helldozer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes you go to hell, and sometimes hell comes to you.

card.name: Mindleech Mass
card.property: Trample Whenever Mindleech Mass deals combat damage to a player, you may look at that player's hand. If you do, you may cast a nonland card in it without paying that card's mana cost.

card.name: Hammerfist Giant
card.property: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit."—Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern

card.name: Cleansing Beam
card.property: Radiance — Cleansing Beam deals 2 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Justice is toothless without punishment. Righteousness cannot succeed without the suffering of the guilty."—Razia

card.name: Necroplasm
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Necroplasm. At the beginning of your end step, destroy each creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Necroplasm. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Blockbuster
card.property: {1} {R}, Sacrifice Blockbuster: Blockbuster deals 3 damage to each tapped creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vendors hung cords heavy with roots and laid out boxes of salted meat, unaware of the fiery disaster swiftly approaching.

card.name: Gaze of the Gorgon
card.property: ({B/G} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) Regenerate target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the dead give way to the mineral gaze of the gorgon.

card.name: Smash
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

card.name: Reroute
card.property: Change the target of target activated ability with a single target. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Three hundred years of practice thwarted by an instant of mischief.

card.name: Guardian of Vitu-Ghazi
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It stands sentinel to the great City-Tree, home of the Selesnya Conclave.

card.name: Gate Hound
card.property: Creatures you control have vigilance as long as Gate Hound is enchanted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ditri, I leave this checkpoint in your capable teeth."—Kitov, nightguard patrol

card.name: Woebringer Demon
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, sacrifice Woebringer Demon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each soul he devours adds its hunger to his own.

card.name: Boros Fury-Shield
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking or blocking creature this turn. If {R} was spent to cast Boros Fury-Shield, it deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

card.name: Dizzy Spell
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Gleancrawler
card.property: ({B/G} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) Trample At the beginning of your end step, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Cerulean Sphinx
card.property: Flying {U}: Cerulean Sphinx's owner shuffles it into his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "About the sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can't tolerate."—Szadek

card.name: Selesnya Sagittars
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Selesnya Sagittars can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What's their strike range, you ask? Let's put it this way: sagittars aim their bows using maps."—Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

card.name: Carven Caryatid
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.

card.name: Vulturous Zombie
card.property: Flying Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Vulturous Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When something dies, all things benefit. Well okay, just our things."—Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

card.name: Hunted Horror
card.property: Trample When Hunted Horror enters the battlefield, target opponent creates two 3/3 green Centaur creature tokens with protection from black.

card.name: Golgari Rot Farm
card.property: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped. When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Coalhauler Swine
card.property: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing stops industry in Ravnica—certainly not the safety of its workers.

card.name: Hex
card.property: Destroy six target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When killing five just isn't enough.

card.name: Scion of the Wild
card.property: Scion of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has a hundred thousand extinctions to avenge.

card.name: Szadek, Lord of Secrets
card.property: Flying If Szadek, Lord of Secrets would deal combat damage to a player, instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Szadek and that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Stone-Seeder Hierophant
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, untap Stone-Seeder Hierophant. {T}: Untap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her touch brings to bare stone what water and sun bring to rich soil.

card.name: Courier Hawk
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.

card.name: Loxodon Hierarch
card.property: When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. {G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."

card.name: Dimir House Guard
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Dimir House Guard. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Root-Kin Ally
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Tap two untapped creatures you control: Root-Kin Ally gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Razia's Purification
card.property: Each player chooses three permanents he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the chosen ones are spared.

card.name: Stoneshaker Shaman
card.property: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player sacrifices an untapped land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no place in Ravnica for stagnation, no room for lands unfilled and untilled.

card.name: Shred Memory
card.property: Exile up to four target cards from a single graveyard. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Golgari Grave-Troll
card.property: Golgari Grave-Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll. Dredge 6 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly six cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Compulsive Research
card.property: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless he or she discards a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

card.name: Dimir Cutpurse
card.property: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other guilds demand tolls from those who travel their territories, but not House Dimir. It takes its share secretly, one coin purse at a time.

card.name: Trophy Hunter
Nightmare Void
card.property: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Mark of Eviction
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, return enchanted creature and all Auras attached to that creature to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tharashk the Bold suddenly wasn't himself. Or anyone else, for that matter.

card.name: Bathe in Light
card.property: Radiance — Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Truth shines even in darkness. Those who march on the side of truth walk always in righteous light."

card.name: Wojek Siren
card.property: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the call to arms, the call to fury, the call to blood.

card.name: Searing Meditation
card.property: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I meditate I see the world as it should be. All that does not fit, I remove."—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

card.name: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
card.property: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature. Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."

card.name: Doubling Season
card.property: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Rolling Spoil
card.property: Destroy target land. If {B} was spent to cast Rolling Spoil, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shadow that fell over the grove was silent yet horribly alive, roiling with millions of tiny minions dedicated to the process of rot.

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Golgari Rotwurm
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

card.name: Pollenbright Wings
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

card.name: Hour of Reckoning
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy all nontoken creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity."—Niszka, Selesnya evangel

card.name: Veteran Armorer
card.property: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me a sword and I'll kill a few enemies. But give me a hammer and a fiery forge, and I'll turn the tide of battle."

card.name: Last Gasp
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Allow me a moment to catch your breath."

card.name: Roofstalker Wight
card.property: {1} {U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No heartbeat to hear, no greed to bribe, no fear of death.

card.name: Lore Broker
card.property: {T}: Each player draws a card, then discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lies are sold as often as truths—and used just as effectively.

card.name: Overwhelm
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the song of Selesnya be heard above the rhythm of our thundering hordes!"

card.name: Skyknight Legionnaire
card.property: Flying, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead."—Razia

card.name: Farseek
card.property: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

card.name: Cloudstone Curio
card.property: Whenever a nonartifact permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another permanent you control that shares a permanent type with it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It wants to remain a mystery, banishing the curious in favor of less inquisitive company.

card.name: Seed Spark
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If {G} was spent to cast Seed Spark, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you ask me, those root-lovers value mindless dogma over progress."—Trivaz, Izzet mage

card.name: Selesnya Sanctuary
card.property: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Boros Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."—Agrus Kos

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Spectral Searchlight
card.property: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color he or she chooses to his or her mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.

card.name: Greater Mossdog
card.property: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.property: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.

card.name: Fiery Conclusion
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Fiery Conclusion, sacrifice a creature. Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

card.name: Viashino Fangtail
card.property: {T}: Viashino Fangtail deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the bony terminus gets too large, it's shed from the tail in coinciding periods of heightened aggression and hunger."—Simic research notes

card.name: Flash Conscription
card.property: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. If {W} was spent to cast Flash Conscription, the creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain that much life" until end of turn.

card.name: Flow of Ideas
card.property: Draw a card for each Island you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A system to direct the flow of Ravnica's entire water supply? Thinking a bit small, aren't we?"—Trivaz, Izzet mage

card.name: Boros Garrison
card.property: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped. When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Centaur Safeguard
card.property: ({G/W} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.) When Centaur Safeguard dies, you may gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Swift, strong, and selfless, the centaurs are the shields of the Conclave.

card.name: Mnemonic Nexus
card.property: Each player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: True enlightenment comes not with a new thought, but with understanding of all the old ones.

card.name: Muddle the Mixture
card.property: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)
